The ringgit and most of its regional peers were traded lower on Wednesday as the US dollar gained across the board ahead of US inflation data release this week.

At 6pm, the ringgit edged down to 4.7690/7730 against the greenback compared with Tuesday's close of 4.7585/7635.
content:
KUALA LUMPUR (Feb 28): The ringgit and most of its regional peers were traded lower on Wednesday as the US dollar gained across the board ahead of US inflation data release this week.

At 6pm, the ringgit edged down to 4.7690/7730 against the greenback compared with Tuesday's close of 4.7585/7635.

The Singapore dollar weakened by 0.2%, Thai baht depreciated 0.48% and the Indonesian rupiah declined 0.6%.
